title: "Learning music the informal way some popular musicians do could inspire more school students"
excerpt: "But this isn’t how many popular musicians – the artists students may be listening to on their way into school – learn how to play music. Their approach is often more informal. Many learn to play by ear, hearing a piece of music and figuring it out on an instrument."
